Articles.Content:
Hi,

I have a small issue with my game. I used to play on MKS mods, but I've switched to Kerbalism at one point. And now, after scanning a Min or Minmus I still see bunch of resources coming from MKS(dirt, chemicals, and so on). Is there a way to get rid of those?

Ormaybe the Scansat mod is adding those resources?

AFAIk, these resources are added by the 'CommunityResourcePack' (which is required by Kerbalism and MKS as well). Theoretically, you can use a MM patch to remove these resources but I don't know if that will break something in Kerbalism.
Thanks for an answer. If somebody knows a way to disable it safely I would be grateful for the info.
